This lab will guide you through coding up a web-based implementation of the classic video game asteroids.

* [Code Editor for Planetoids](https://editor.p5js.org/ChrisOrban/sketches/t40RIIWh2)

## Learning Objectives
 At the end of this lesson students will...

* Apply kinematic equations to code an object's motion when force is applied
* Apply Newtonâ€™s laws of motion to code how an object behaves under different net force conditions
* Evaluate how changing mass can optimize spacecraft maneuverability
